description: AI/ML Engineer passionate about computer vision, NLP, and building scalable machine learning systems. My portfolio showcases projects in image generation, MLOps, and cloud architecture.
bio:
Currently, I work on computer vision at Easel AI as a Machine Learning Engineer, where I build and optimize large-scale AI pipelines for image generation and facial reenactment. Revamped Infra and shipped core AI features for image generation for [App](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/easel-ai/id6448734086) & [API](https://replicate.com/easel). 

Prior to Easel, I worked at [Cognizant](https://www.cognizant.com/us/en) as a Software Engineer, where I worked on transitioning from monolithic to microservices architecture for scale, speed, and reliability. Built scalable cloud infrastructure with CI/CD, Kubernetes & IaC, streamlined deployments, improved reliability, and led internal teams while optimizing resources and enforcing security best practices.

masters.university: University of Cincinnati, Carl H. Lindner College of Business

bachelors.university: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
bachelors.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
highlights: Maintained and optimized image generation pipeline reducing latency
Improved image quality by developing custom ComfyUI nodes and leveraging LLMs
Led critical cloud migration ensuring high availability
Designed image captioning and indexing system boosting search relevancy by 30%
Deployed Prometheus and Grafana for system-wide observability
Engineered face-swapping pipeline with Mediapipe and PyTorch

experience.title: AI and MLOps Intern
highlights: Deployed Redis setup as core pub/sub layer for multi-cloud architecture
Built Cloud Function for shareable image previews
Automated CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions
Deployed txt2image API endpoint for image generation pipeline

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Engineered automated CI/CD pipelines using Git, Terraform, Azure, Kubernetes
Reduced cloud costs by 35% through optimization strategies
Mentored 5 junior engineers on security best practices
Re-architected high-traffic portal (10K+ users/day) reducing API response times by 40%
